      • validLocation

        public boolean validLocation(int row,
                             int col)
        Is a grid position valid?
        Parameters:
        row - row location of checkerboard
        ccol - column location of checkerboard
        Returns:
        returns true if row & col fall within the dimensions of the checkerboard

      • squareIsBlack

        public boolean squareIsBlack(int r,
                             int c)
        Black squares can be found in Even Row & Odd Column Odd Row & Even Column
        Parameters:
        r - row location of checkerboard
        c - column location of checkerboard
        Returns:
        returns true if location (r,c) is a black square on the checkerboard

      • squareIsOccupied

        public boolean squareIsOccupied(int r,
                                int c)
        Parameters:
        r - row location of checkerboard
        c - column location of checkerboard
        Returns:
        returns true is there is a checker piece on the grid location (r,c) otherwise returns false

        public boolean isPlayerOne(int row,

        Determines who is at location (r,c)
        Parameters:
        r - is the row in the grid to check
        c - is column in the gird to check
        Returns:
